With label:

```js
<TextArea id="textarea1" label="Please enter some text" rows="8" cols="40" />
```

Required:

```js
<TextArea
  id="textarea2"
  label="Please enter some text"
  rows="8"
  cols="40"
  required
/>
```

Disabled:

```js
<TextArea
  id="textarea3"
  label="This component is disabled"
  rows="8"
  cols="40"
  disabled
/>
```
